ygData.subject: Re: SK Quest armor (Questions and spoiler/rumors)
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t forget the skarlon ... From: Wilson, ThomasX B  To: shadowknight@onelist.com  Date: Tuesday,
ygData.messageBody:
Don't forget the skarlon


-----Original Message-----
From: Wilson, ThomasX B <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
To: 'shadowknight@onelist.com' <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 11:54 AM
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] SK Quest armor (Questions and spoiler/rumors)


>From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
>On a note about the FR.. Easy to get actually, no camping involved (at
least
>on Innoruuk).. I just happened to be in Sol B killing Greaters when a group
>camping the king shouted Free FleshRipper (got my Carnal Pauldrons the same
>way).. Later that day they offered at least 2 more..
>
>Other than that I now carry DR, FR, MM shield (Best looking shield in the
>game IMHO) and Crystalline Sword (want a Ykesha but long camp, no one seems
>to be giving these out for some odd reason).. Now all I need is a Mithril 2
>hander and a Soul Leech and my collection will be complete (I'm guessing a
>while on those 2)..
>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Chip Paul [mailto:cpaul@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 12:57 PM
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [shadowknight] SK Quest armor (Questions and
>spoiler/rumors)
>
>
>From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>
>"Wilson, ThomasX B" wrote:
>>
>
>> On another subject anybody else besides me seem to be carrying a lot of
>> weapons around lately? Just realized last night that I have 3 different
>> weapons on me at any given time...(Thank god for EE sacks..)..
>>
>
>I carry my Dark Reaver, Silver one hander, and a cracked darkwood
>shield. If I ever get a box of Abu Kar, I will include a Reaper of
>the dead (for emergencies) and Fleshripper (if I get one).
>
>Xilith
>

>-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
